snippet: More voters in three swing states said they expect Representative Paul D. Ryan to win tonight's debate against Vice President Joseph R. Biden, Jr., according to the latest Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls.
abstract: More voters in three swing states said they expect Representative Paul D. Ryan to win tonight's debate against Vice President Joseph R. Biden, Jr., according to the latest Quinnipiac University/New York Times/CBS News polls.

headline.main: Voters in Three Swing States Predict Ryan Will Win Debate
